divs: Sighting DetailsI spent 22 years in the Navy and when I got out I had a clean bill of health and I didn't have this object that is under the skin in my left knee, all of a sudden one day I go to get x-rays of my knees and noticed this strange object in my left knee. I'm 58 yrs old and don't do things where I would fall and have something embed itself in my knee, I would have remembered that. I can't remember any event where this would have happened. I have included the photos of the x-rays for you to see
